name: Griddlers: Asian Riddles Free
description:
The game in the genre of Japanese crosswords (Nonograms).

This genre also known as griddlers, picross, hanjie, nonograms, japanese crosswords, logic puzzles, pic-a-pix, nonogramme, logimage, logic art, japanilainen ristikko, kare karalamaca, nonogramas, malovane krizovky, crucipixel.

108 unique levels

More than 4 hours of gameplay

Spectacular trophies

Charming oriental atmosphere
